review.reviewText: Exercise 1 - All answers are correct. We have nothing to add. Exercise 2 - Query1 : right Query2 : right Query3 : Books is a database no datastream. Therefore, books need to be joined with the datastream RFID_streams. The time window needs to be applied to the RFID_stream. Query4 : Where do you check if it was taken back? Except that, it seems to be right. Query5 : Why room_number 4? Please make assumptions explicit. Is room number 4 the room where all books can be taken out of the library without being checked out? Datastreams need time windows. Exercise 3 - The solutions are correct and produces the expected result set. The queries could have been written in more readable manner.
